entry.title: Second try...
entry.summary:
An Auspicous Day

This is my second try at starting my own blog. I started one a year ago and, unfortunately, left it--forgotten like my interest in learning banjo and harmonica. Today is a couple days after the election and things seem to be looking up! Hopefully things continue to â€¦
entry.content:
An Auspicous Day

This is my second try at starting my own blog. I started one a year ago and, unfortunately, left it--forgotten like my interest in learning banjo and harmonica. Today is a couple days after the election and things seem to be looking up! Hopefully things continue to get better!
